name: undubbed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a film or television programme is undubbed, the sounds and speech on it have not been changed, especially to a different language: The song is undubbed and the sound quality is fantastic. For undubbed versions with French subtitles, look out for the letters VO (version originale) in listings or posters.
More examplesFewer examplesThe use of English in international business, computers, and now the Internet, along with pop music and undubbed Hollywood films, ensure that it is constantly practised.The album is a selection of raw, undubbed masters of original Holly recordings.They released a black-and-white, unscored, undubbed video copy of the original ending.The series of short films is recommended for anime viewers, even in unsubtitled undubbed form.
